name: checkerboard slippers
notes:
2 contrasting colours, 1 skein each.

free pdf version of the pattern can be found [here n this blog post][1].

[woolworks archive link:][2]

also found on some ballbands of the phentex yarn.

gauge given is yarn gauge from the label, there is no gauge given in the pattern itself.


  [1]: https://h3dakota.com/2013/03/31/checkerboard-slippers/
  [2]: http://web.archive.org/web/20120126102143/http://www.woolworks.org/patterns/slippers.txt
